item.title: Priests in Jogulamba Gadwal Meet to Discuss Unpaid Salaries and Plan Statewide Ritual in Hyderabad
item.description:
<![CDATA[-Advertisement-
A key gathering of temple priests from various areas in Jogulamba Gadwal district took place today at the Swayambhu Lakshmi Venkateshwara Swamy Temple. Sri Chakravarthi Acharya, the district president of the Archaka Samakhya, led the meeting.
Priests from Gattu, Maldakal, Gadwal, Rajoli, Manavapadu, and other regions actively joined the discussion. They focused on the issue of unpaid salaries for four months. The priests voiced their concerns and urged authorities to resolve th...]]>
item.author: Rajesh M, Https, Latest News Hyderabad, Telangana, India, World, Please Enter Your Name Here

item.title: Devotees Celebrate Tholi Ekadashi with Processions and Special Prayers in Gadwal District
item.description:
<![CDATA[-Advertisement-
Gadwal celebrated Ashada Shuddha Ekadashi with vibrant religious events across the district. Many devotees gathered at major temples to partake in spiritual rituals and processions filled with enthusiasm and devotion.
At the Ambabhavani Temple, a colorful procession was held for Tholi Ekadashi. The festival idols of Lord Panduranga and Goddess Rukmini were paraded grandly from the temple to the sacred Jami Tree. Devotees filled the air with bhajans and devotional songs. After a...]]>
item.author: Rajesh M, Https, Latest News Hyderabad, Telangana, India, World, Please Enter Your Name Here
